ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, a couple of things here. Aye, you need two cards to do two monitors. I imagine it wouldn work without some extensive setup work, as everything maximized
ygData.messageBody:
Well, a couple of things here.

Aye, you need two cards to do two monitors. I imagine it wouldn' work
without some extensive setup work, as everything maximized on two monitors
I've seen takes up both monitors, it's just real wide. Windows sees it as
one monitor, but I think it can distinguigh between the two. Again, I'm not
sure (feels like I'm shooting holes in my own idea...heh).

Second, you CAN run programs behind EQ, AND I haven't figured out to see
them without exiting EQ. Ever hit your Windows key and hear your start bar
in the background pop up? I shut down my PC on accident about 12 or 13 times
before I finally pulled the 102-104 keys off my damn keyboard. I've also
exiting EQ and found 10 Explorer Windows up cuz I hit that damn Start key
and DIDN'T shit down, just started up a bunch of other stuff. I just don't
know how to GET to it without shutting down.

Any ideas people?

-----Original Message-----
From: Omeg Felligan [mailto:omeg_felligan@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 1:47 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>

I'm not sure about the program thing (to minimise), and I haven't tried the
2 monitors...I may be able to but I doubt it (I don't think any of my
friends would loan me a moniter for a game). Do you need a 2nd graphics
card for a 2nd moniter? I'm guessing you would need one in which case I
can't do it anyway b/c I have no open slots and my current card is bult into

the motherboard (darn Compaq).

About that program...what does Alt-Tab do? wouldn't it be just about the
same as a program sending the EQ window a command to minimise? in that case

the result would be the same (logging out, computer locking up mostly, etc).

But it might be different.

anyone have ideas?

Omeg
